review_blob: To begin, Im a lover of ales, hoppy IPAs and spicy wits. That said. This is probably one of the best bottles of beer Ive ever sat down and enjoyed. Dark, creamy, malty, sweet, fruity, rich, the healthy ABV sneaks up and reminds you its a winter warmer not a tailgater, but soooo smooth for a serious winter  beer. Made me want to go out and buy a Heath bar. So rich and decadent, theres a good reason its sold in 4 packs
beer_name: Samuel Adams Imperial Series Double Bock

review_blob: Like a beautiful woman with an STD Smells great looks fantastic One taste and youre sorry you brought her home. They emptied  the cupboard on this one and theres so much going on you cannot focus on one taste. the smoky chocolate aroma is overcome by bitterness in the first taste. A shame  have had much better from this brewer

rolled bottle  popped sniffed sipped drank. Wonderful citrus aroma, just enough spice on palate. clean refreshing finish. Has a alot going on for just a basic  wit. Not my favorite offering from this solid brewer, but might be the most drinkable
